articles.title: Oklahoma little league batter consoles tearful opposing pitcher after being hit in head during LLWS qualifier
articles.description: In a dramatic scene at a Little League regional tournament game Tuesday in Texas, batter Isaiah Jarvis walked to the mound to comfort opposing pitcher Kaiden Shelton after the right-hander's pitch slammed into Jarvis' helmet, sending him to the ground.
articles.content:
WACO, Texas -- A little league batter rose after being hit in the head to console the upset pitcher who threw the pitch during a Little League regional tournament game Tuesday in Waco, Texas.
The dr… [+912 chars]

articles.title: Federal judge rejects bid by three LIV golfers to compete in FedEx Cup playoffs
articles.description: A federal judge on Tuesday denied a temporary restraining order to three golfers who were seeking to participate in the FedEx Cup Playoffs after leaving the PGA Tour for the upstart LIV Golf Invitational Series.

articles.title: Rams coach Sean McVay announces he signed extension with team during offseason, says GM Les Snead's deal still in works
articles.description: Los Angeles Rams head coach Sean McVay said he signed a contract extension during the offseason, but the team was waiting to announce it until general manager Les Snead signed an extension as well.

articles.title: NFL commissioner Roger Goodell says evidence calls for at least full-year suspension for Cleveland Browns QB Deshaun Watson

articles.description: The Browns fear that receiver and returner Jakeem Grant suffered a torn Achilles in Tuesday's practice, a source told ESPN.

articles.title: Aaron Rodgers doesn't see 'any benefit to playing one series' in a preseason game
articles.description: Green Bay Packers quarterback Aaron Rodgers said Tuesday he doesn't see "any benefit" to playing one series in a preseason game, but he's willing to play if coach Matt LaFleur deems it necessary.

articles.title: Washington Commanders fire DL coach Sam Mills after 'difference of philosophy'
articles.description: Commanders coach Ron Rivera cited a "difference in philosophy," as the reason for firing defensive line coach Sam Mills on Tuesday. Mills had been with Rivera since 2011 and is being replaced by his assistant, Jeff Zgonina.
